trans-unit.source: ({B/G} can be paid with either {B} or {G}.) Trample At the beginning of your end step, return to your hand all creature cards in your graveyard that were put there from the battlefield this turn.
({U/B} can be paid with either {U} or {B}.) {3}{U}: Target player draws a card. Activate only as a sorcery. {3}{B}: Target player discards a card. Activate only as a sorcery.
